name: ShareGroup
description: Definition of groups to share datasets between scicat users

members.description: Defines the emails of users that data is shared to

archiveEmailNotification.description: Flag is true when an email notification should be sent to archiveEmailsToBeNotified upon an archive job creation

archiveEmailsToBeNotified.description: Array of additional email addresses that should be notified up an archive job creation

retrieveEmailNotification.description: Flag is true when an email notification should be sent to retrieveEmailsToBeNotified upon a retrieval job creation

retrieveEmailsToBeNotified.description: Array of additional email addresses that should be notified up a retrieval job creation

embargoPeriod.description: Number of years after dataset creation before the dataset becomes public
